participant_1.background:
I would love to have lunch with a well-known translator, so I can learn more about the industry and get some advice on my own career.
I like to spend time alone, pursuing my own interests.
my family gets together every saturday.
i started a new job this year , which is helping me learn more about socialization.
i am still living at home at age 30.

I remember playing guitar with my friends in my basement for hours.
my father used to be a cop.
I'm not into fortune tellers, but I'm really interested in my family history.
i sew my own clothes.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you! How about you?
I'm doing okay, thanks! I'm just waiting for my coffee to finish brewing.
Oh, nice! I love coffee. I drink it every morning.
Me too! It's the best way to start the day.
What kind of coffee do you like?
I like a good cup of drip coffee. I'm not really into fancy coffee drinks.
Me neither. I just like my coffee black and strong.
I like mine with a little milk and sugar.
That's cool. Do you like to drink coffee at home or do you go to coffee shops?
I usually drink coffee at home, but I do go to coffee shops sometimes.
Me too. I love going to coffee shops to get work done.
I like that too. It's a good place to relax and get some work done.
What do you do for work?
I'm a translator.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in translation.
It's a great job! I get to work with people from all over the world.
That sounds really interesting. I've never had lunch with a translator before.
It would be my pleasure! I love talking about my job.
Great! I'll send you a message later this week and we can set something up
